Toothbrush with Built-in Toothpaste Dispenser: Create a toothbrush with a built-in toothpaste dispenser that automatically releases the right amount of toothpaste onto the bristles every time you brush. This eliminates the need for manual toothpaste application and ensures a consistent brushing experience. The dispenser can be designed to be easy to load and clean, making it a convenient and hygienic option for users.

Smart Toothbrush with Personalized Brushing Plans: Develop a toothbrush that uses AI technology to create personalized brushing plans based on the user's oral health needs. The toothbrush can track the user's brushing habits and adjust the brushing pattern accordingly. For example, if the user has a history of tooth decay, the toothbrush can provide a more thorough cleaning in those areas. The personalized plans can help users maintain good oral hygiene and prevent future problems.

Interactive Toothbrush with Games and Rewards: Create a toothbrush that offers interactive games and rewards to make brushing more enjoyable for kids. The toothbrush can have a built-in sensor that detects when the user is brushing correctly and provides positive reinforcement through sounds, lights, or vibrations. The games can be designed to teach kids about good oral hygiene practices and make brushing a fun and engaging experience.

Portable Toothbrush with Built-in Battery: Design a toothbrush that is portable and has a built-in battery, allowing users to brush their teeth anywhere, anytime. The toothbrush can have a slim design that fits easily into a purse or backpack, making it perfect for travel or on-the-go brushing. The built-in battery can provide up to several days of use on a single charge, eliminating the need for a bulky power adapter.
